properties.name: Abbey Lane
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonFamily place. Neighborhood restaurant. This is a great little local place. Sort of tucked away and undiscovered. We\'ve been there for breakfast and lunch and generally had the place to ourselves. They have the most amazing sweetened sweet potato fries.

properties.name: BJ's Chicago Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson

properties.name: Charro Chicken
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonCounter Service

properties.name: Chipotle
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonOwned by McDonald\'s. Fare Mexican food. Nice outdoor location

properties.name: Corner Bakery
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonA chain, but good quick breakfast and lunch. Try the brownies.

properties.name: Egg Plantation
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonGreat local place for breakfast. The specials are particularly good.

properties.name: Eggs n Things
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonGreat family breakfast

properties.name: Fresh Works
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonJulie\'s favorite Counter/table service lunch place. A huge menu adn the best gyros in town. The owner is Greek and works the counter. We go here for lunch and then do grocery shopping at Trader Joe\'s while the boys finish their cookies and lollipops. Next to Trader Jo\'s. Locally owned.

properties.name: Garlic Jim's
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonA new place. We haven\'t tried it.

properties.name: George's
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonDate night

properties.name: Island's Burgers
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonHarris\' favorite restaurant. The best burgers at a sit-down.

properties.name: Karma Indian
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonOutstanding Indian food. We\'ve only done takeout. The inside looks nice, though.

properties.name: La Cocina
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonThis sit-down Mexican restaurant is supposed to be the best in town. We\'ve only been there a few times, but it was great.

properties.name: Maru Sushi
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonDate Night place

properties.name: Mojito
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson

properties.name: Nick n Willy's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonTake and bake pizza. Good family night in. We love their Take-n-bake (especially the Aegean).

properties.name: Oats n Whey
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson

properties.name: Origami
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson

properties.name: Panera
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson

properties.name: Pei Wei
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonThis is the PF Chang\'s takeout place. Lots of the same menu items for much cheaper and faster and easier on the kids.

properties.name: Rosie's BBQ
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonAnother new place we haven\'t tried. It smelled good in there when we picked up the menu :)

properties.name: Rubio's Fish Tacos
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson

properties.name: Salt Creek
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonDate Night Place

properties.name: South Point
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson

properties.name: Spumoni
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonThe only Italian restaurant aound that is really any good (though I know some people who love Cicily at the mall. They have a nice patio, too. Always a plus with the kids.

properties.name: Stonefire Grill
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonVery family friendly! (ie, noisy, quick, kids menu)

properties.name: The Habit
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonThe best, cheapest burger in town. There are two locations - Granary Square (on McBean near the hospital) and on Rye Canyon by LA Fitness.

properties.name: The Habit
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonBurger place

properties.name: The Social
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonDate Night

properties.name: Wahoo Fish Tacos
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonA Mexican fish taco chain. Fun atmosphere to eat in.

properties.name: Wana Iguana
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonThis is our favorite Mexican fast food place. Counter service. Recommend the Bravo Burrito!

properties.name: Westridge Golf Club
properties.description: Posted by Digitalwatson Open to the public. Good food. Occasional live music. Great date night.

properties.name: Wild Thyme
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonGood for breakfast/brunch. The banana\'s foster is good, but the service is SLOW. Not recommended for kids.

properties.name: Wolf Creek
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonLocally owned brew pub. Good food, but long waits.

properties.name: Wood Ranch BBQ
properties.description: Posted by DigitalwatsonA sit-down BBQ place. We often order takeout from here (amazing ribs) and they will bring it out to your car. No need to haul the kids out of their carseats.
